vandekadsye.tanghe.ActionAndPool

Class ResourcePool<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • vandekadsye.tanghe.ActionAndPool.ResourcePool<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the resource to manage in the pool.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasketPool, CubiclePool

    public abstract class ResourcePool<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    Pool of resources. Must be extended.

        a free resource that can be used
